mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (coupon_name,coupon_sale_price,coupon_grade,use_by_date,createdate) VALUE ('silver', 1000, 'silver', (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)), NOW() ) , ('gold', 2000, 'gold', (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)), NOW() ) , ('vip', 3000, 'vip', (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE mycoupon SET state='Y' WHERE mycoupon_key=#{mycouponKey}
mapper.select: SELECT mc.mycoupon_key mycouponKey , mc.state state , mc.coupon_key couponKey , c.coupon_name couponName , c.coupon_sale_price couponSalePrice , c.coupon_grade couponGrade , c.use_by_date useByDate , c.createdate createdate FROM mycoupon mc INNER JOIN coupon c ON mc.coupon_key = c.coupon_key WHERE mc.customer_id= #{customerId} ORDER BY c.use_by_date ASC

SELECT coupon_key couponKey , coupon_name couponName , coupon_sale_price couponSalePrice , coupon_grade couponGrade , use_by_date useByDate , createdate createdate FROM coupon WHERE coupon_key=#{couponKey}
